channel.title: Bird on Welcome
channel.description: Recent content in Bird on Welcome

item.title: First light with Sigma 150-600 S
item.description: Made this snap of a white-tailed eagle(Haliaeetus albicilla) handheld from a moving boat. Used Sigma 150-600S on a Canon 60D. (600mm, 1/1250 s, f/7.1, ISO 500)
